reviewText: It's fantastic that this information has been revealed so clearly.  With the truth available, the truth about how inept and corrupt our government is for doing this and the utter evil behind the cabal of banksters looting the American people, I can't understand why it's still going on.

If you want to know how money is created and how debt-based money is enslaving all nations you should watch this video from Bill Still. This video has been an eye openner for myself. I really recommend you to watch it. The best info I have watched in years. Thanks
very interesting. I just love history
the painful truth! what a way to run a country, middle ages surfdom as a result of "fractional lending by the "big banks", excellent documentary
